modName: Companion Adder Robinno - Khajiiti Archer - Boxer
summary: This Mod Adds A New Companion to The Game. Located At The Bannered Mare At Whiterun. Read More inside.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Desc. And Info About This Mod

- Adds A New Companion. Khajiiti. Archer / Boxer.
- Very Powerful Fists (Nearly Kills Draugr With 2 Fist hits)
- Located At - The Bannered Mare At Whiterun.

Mod Requirements

- None

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Info About Future Mods

- I will Be making Companion Mods, So If U Like These Things Make Sure U Add Me :)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

info about Other/Permissions

- I Allow Mod Reviews. Just Comment In The Comments The Link :)
- I Do Not Give Permission To Copy This Mod. yet I Do Allow translations.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: unkownRb
